entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:28 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa steady
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -28.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
